dmca.title: BRIC Robotics Asks Google To Remove Sites (#1)
dmca.body:
May 20, 2004

BRIC Engineered Systems Limited
[private]
Spencerport NY 14559
xxx-xxx-xxxx

[private]@[private].com

Dear Google Team

When searching for spray robots:

Our webpage at #2 www.bricengineeredsystems.com/sprayrobots.htm has been copied at #4 www.ie-systems.com/sprayrobots.htm

When searching for degating robots:

Our website at #1 www.bricengineeredsystems.com/degatingrobots.htm has been copied at #3 www.ie-systems.com/degatingrobots.html

Infringing owner of website:

Administrative Contact;
[private] ([private]) [private]@[private].COM
Innovative Systems Automation, Inc.
[private]
Plainville, CT 06062
US
(xxx) xxx-xxxx fax: (xxx) xxx-xxxx

Technical Contact:
Innovative Systems Automation Inc. ([private]) [private]@[private].COM
[private]
Plainville, CT 06062
US
(xxx) xxx-xxxx

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing webpages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Regards,

[private]
Business Development
